attributes.action: Peter and Pamela Evans, Lisa Jane and William Pratt, Bill Edwards, and others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the extreme stress placed on our poorly paid and woefully equipped servicemen and women serving in Afghanistan and Iraq,they should be provided with free transport when on leave, especially when travelling in the scandalously expensive capital. £2 minimum fare makes even a short stay in London prohibitively expensive for people who risk their lives for us in the most dangerous 24/7 war zones in modern times. Give them a break; give them an oyster card. We as a country can afford it - and we owe it to them.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
